I think this would be the big differences
I need to learn how to get the right timing to throw and cut to the right position in the game

but now you need to do task-sharing with others in Huston Rockets, how would you adjust yourself to it?
well...I have to adjust a lot.
first of all, I need to get higher scores on my shooting behind the arc
